title: from defaultPath Portfolio Website
description: Dynamic PHP + MySQL website with caching, controllers, models & animations.

title: D E-Commerce Backend

title: Online Quiz Platform
description: An interactive quiz system where users can take timed tests, view scores, and track progress. Admins can manage questions dynamically.
